hostilenetworks.gui.learner_empty.3: when placed in the Deep Learner.
hostilenetworks.gui.learner_empty.5: In order to train the model
hostilenetworks.gui.learner_empty.6: you must deliver the killing blow.

hostilenetworks.info.deep_learner: Displays a %s when held and models are within
hostilenetworks.msg.no_model: No known models exist for this specimen.
hostilenetworks.trivia.blaze:
Bring buckets and watch in despair
as it evaporates, and everything is
on fire. You are on fire.
hostilenetworks.trivia.creeper:
An inverse architect by trade.
Generally misunderstood.
hostilenetworks.trivia.ender_dragon:
Lord of The End, yet keeps no hoard.
Destroy the crystals, break the cycle.
hostilenetworks.trivia.enderman:
Friendly unless provoked.
Fooled by pumpkins.
Teleports short distances.
hostilenetworks.trivia.ghast:
If you hear something that sounds
like a crying llama, you're probably
hearing a ghast.
hostilenetworks.trivia.skeleton:
A formidable archer, but may be
running some sort of cheat engine.
A shield would be useful.
hostilenetworks.trivia.slime:
"A Slime Haiku"
The bounce
bounce his bounce
squish
hostilenetworks.trivia.spider:
Nocturnal douchebags.
Drops strands of string for some reason.
hostilenetworks.trivia.witch:
Affinity with potions and concoctions.
Maybe you should develop an antidote.
hostilenetworks.trivia.wither_skeleton:
A charred skeleton.
Its bow did not survive the process.
Hunted for their skulls.
hostilenetworks.trivia.wither:
Do not approach this enemy, run!
I mean it has 3 heads, what could
possibly go wrong?
hostilenetworks.trivia.zombie:
They moan in the moonlight.
Does not understand the need
for personal space.
hostilenetworks.trivia.guardian:
Some sort of mutated pufferfish.
Beware the beam attack!
hostilenetworks.trivia.evoker:
A powerful spellcaster.
Knows the secrets of undeath.
hostilenetworks.trivia.elder_guardian:
The largest of the ocean
creatures, it lives in great
underwater monuments.
hostilenetworks.trivia.magma_cube:
What happens if we give lava life?
This, this is what happens.
That's why we don't do that.
hostilenetworks.trivia.phantom:
Annoying little beasts who
insist you go to sleep.
The Insomnia Police.
hostilenetworks.trivia.shulker:
A reinforced, teleporting cannon.
Makes a nice chest when slain.
hostilenetworks.trivia.vindicator:
An axe-wielding maniac.
Probably advisable to keep a
safe distance.
hostilenetworks.trivia.zombified_piglin:
A poor nether-dweller turned
into a zombie. Has a lot of gold, though.
